attributes.action: Make Boris Johnson enter a tv debate with live Q&A before the Tory leadership
attributes.background: Boris Johnson avoids all TV debates and doesn’t seem to answer any questions about Brexit or other policies. Given he is the front runner to be the next PM, he should be tested/quizzed  on how he proposes to lead the country so the Tory party can make an informed decision.

rejection.details: This would be a personal decision for Boris Johnson and not the UK Government or Parliament.
